How does the Verus Project envision identity management, according to its vision paper?

The Verus Project envisions a system where users can easily create and manage multiple identities on its multi-blockchain system. These identities can accumulate value and have multiple personas, reflecting the various facets of a person's identity in their personal and professional lives.
